properties.areaDesc: Ocracoke Island; East Carteret; Southern Craven
properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued February 20 at 3:18PM EST until February 21 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...1 to 2 feet with local rises up to 3 feet of inundation
above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines
and tidal waterways.

* WHERE...Areas along the lower Neuse and Trent Rivers and
adjacent tidal creeks, areas along the lower Neuse River,
Pamlico, Core and Back Sounds, and adjacent tidal creeks.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only
isolated road closures expected.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY
